name: Zombie maze (itch) (DeadCode1)
description:
Escape from scary the maze

Zombies are scary, you're a robot and there's a virus that made all the zombies and most of the zombie-ravaged robots and you're the only one who survived and you're looking for a safe place until you found this maze and thought it was safe, but you didn't know there were zombies and you found out they were dying from the sorcery book and you had to get it, you had to collect 10 coins to take and skip !!

Controls:

use A,S,D,W to move

SHIFT for run

space to jump

Have fun :)!
